name: VikingGTD
tagline: The perfect "Getting Things Done" Software Suite
body:
The legacy GoogleApp VikingGTD is being rebooted into a much more ambitious  project.

Please see the github [Source Code Repository](https://github.com/jgaa/VikingGTD) for more info.

There is a nice introduction to the project.

Released under GPLv3.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
